steps.description: Upload your WEBP: Click upload to choose a file from your computer, or drag your file into the dropzone above.
Click â€˜Convert to PNG: This converts your file from WEBP to PNG.

whyConvert.title: Why convert WEBP to PNG files
paragraphs: Using our WEBP to PNG converter ensures compatibility across various platforms and applications. Our file converter maintains image quality without compression loss to maintain your pixel-perfect images.
Choosing a WEBP to PNG file converter ensures consistency and ease of use within your workflow and allows for more advanced editing possibilities for your PNG files.
